title: Malosha  wanga ya bhiambu bhya Korona

summary: This book gives basic advice on dealing with the coronavirus COVID 19

1.tvs: Malosha  wanga ya bhiambu bhya Korona

2.tvs: Malosha  wanga ya bhiambu bhya Korona

3.tvs: Malosha  wanga ya bhiambu bhya Korona

8.tvs: Translated by Matayo Tariwoi M., Daniel Kichogha M. & Mathias Letiaki A.

9.tvs: Translated by Matayo Tariwoi M., Daniel Kichogha M. & Mathias Letiaki A.

11.tvs: Hena tiki kindu KIMWE ukundike kutwarija bhundu bhiambu bya korona

19.tvs: Bhiambu bhinararia igheri  mate hai lukoho luna bhiambu

20.tvs: Kuikaa hae naye. Bhueza bhwa kusongeriana mashoghwe bhwa mita 2 bhukukinda na mate ma lukoho.

24.tvs: Hena hubho ukambhona mndu ekoha pada/ebigha fua/ebhonekana muaji uidima:

25.tvs: Muinge kitambaa cha kuchunga fua na momo.﻿ Bheidima kukohia kana kubigha fua na cho, na kubhakinda na bhiambu bhandu bhose bheoho afuhi nabho.

29.tvs: Hengi esi muwaji, eteoho ekukinda tiki

31.tvs: Na hena ibhi bhyose tuidima tukaghamba iti ni chedi mndu akubhike hae na mbotu ya bhandu, amu usiidima kutwarija iti niani eidima kuoka muaji.

39.tvs: Naetee mbai ya shighati ya kitambaa chako cha kujibha fua na momo.

45.tvs: Kake naetee hubho, hena igheri mate ma mndu muwaji meidima mekaoka na bhindu ibhi…

49.tvs: Na ukakunda bhindu ibhi usibharirie, na ade ugure bhusho bhwako,

50.tvs: na zia yedi tiki ya kubhikenja ni kuoja bhia ibhyo na sabuni, bhikuruta ikwe, kana bhiengeji.

51.tvs: Bhiambu bhiidima kuoka moo hena masaa matare  bhireoho na bhia

54.tvs: Ichi nicho kindu kioho kiinga tughambe iti ni chedi kuyoa iti tuoho turateria

55.tvs: Oja nezo na sabuni mhaka aha.

58.tvs: Usigure bhusho bhwako. (Kana bhusho bhwa mndu ungi.) Na ikaoka iti nire ugure bhusho, oja ini nezo mikono yako na sabuni.

59.tvs: Igheri lifishie kubhina kibhini cha ‘Izirihiwa msi wa Kubhoneka’ ndekero keeri.

65.tvs: Ukakunda  usiituke. Oja tiki mikono yako na sabuni.

66.tvs: Kaja uidima usikunde mbai ya shighati ya kijibha fua na momo chako.

68.tvs: Bhiini bhya Bakitiria bhinamea  mbai ya ndeni ya bhijibha fua na momo bhikadokwa igheri ieza

69.tvs: Bhijibha fua na momo bhidokwe tiki hena msi mmwe!  Ade  bhibhiritwe handu eho bhisiidima kukundwa ni ungi.

74.tvs: Kila mndu aoke na taulo yakwe

75.tvs: Bhandu bhasitang’are kijo, bhia bhya kulia, ndemwa, taulo.

76.tvs: Usiidima kukunda bhusho bhwako na kikokor chako naetee ukateghesha zee.

77.tvs: Kaja uidima shindika mlango ujughuke na kikokora chako kana kituro. Usishindike na mikono yako.

79.tvs: na gheri twafuma kutorana na bhandu.

81.tvs: Misi yose tuoje mikono yetu na sabuni…

90.tvs: “How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands”. By Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, opinion.  (Jan 28,2020).

91.tvs: Hala tuidima tukapata malosha ama ma bhurighiti:

92.tvs: Igheri utang’ara malosha ama hena mitandao wasembwa ukumbuke maaghanyo ama matatu: 1) Usikoranye kila chtamwa hena zia yoyose. 2) Malosha ama esimakutagha esa kukumazia hena zia yoyose. 3) Ukaoka ukundie kuhiria kindu chochose ndima ii shigha mwenye ndima atwarije hena FB  kubhetia mitandao iji: @weimankowart, on IG by tagging @weimankow (IG), or providing a link to instagram com/weimankow. Ukakunda kuhiria kindu chochose ndima ii kindu ukundike kuhira ni kusemba uingwe ngalo iyo ni mwenye hena mtandao wa:comicsforgood@gmail.com
